description: Generates a client SDK for a RestApi and Stage.

parameters.name: restApiId
parameters.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

parameters.name: stageName
parameters.description: The name of the Stage that the SDK will use.

parameters.name: sdkType
parameters.description: The language for the generated SDK. Currently java, javascript, android, objectivec (for iOS), swift (for iOS), and ruby are supported.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: A string-to-string key-value map of query parameters sdkType-dependent properties of the SDK. For sdkType of objectivec or swift, a parameter named classPrefix is required. For sdkType of android, parameters named groupId, artifactId, artifactVersion, and invokerPackage are required. For sdkType of java, parameters named serviceName and javaPackageName are required. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: contentType
nested_items.description: The content-type header value in the HTTP response.

nested_items.name: contentDisposition
nested_items.description: The content-disposition header value in the HTTP response.

nested_items.name: body
nested_items.description: The binary blob response to GetSdk, which contains the generated SDK.
